long_description: With years of research and development into them, the fully adjustable, well-cushioned Burton Custom snowboard bindings are all-mountain slayers that will take your performance to the next level. Single-component, lightweight yet tough, polycarbonate baseplates create moderate flex and consistent response for a versatile ride on all terrain. Single-component, symmetric highbacks are responsive; minimized design saves precious weight, and they rotate to follow natural leg contours, optimizing comfort and power. Tool-free, forward-lean micro adjustment lets you dial in and lock forward your lean angle on the fly; forward lean adjusts independently of side-to-side rotation. Highbacks feature Over The Top padding for extra cushioning that won't bite your calves. FullBED cushioning covers the entire baseplate to maximize comfort and minimize fatigue; extendable toe ramps reduce toe drag and increase responsiveness. Primo Capstrap(TM) toe straps lock you into the bindings; lushly padded, precurved ankle straps feature telescoping and multi-location adjustability. Smooth Glide(TM) buckles are strong and easy to grab for quick closure and release. Burton Custom bindings are compatible with traditional 3D(TM), 4x4 bolt patterns and The Channel.
